T02D2081:159a-1: pi sh'a tse karna gri ha sv'a dha nam /
T02D2081:159a-3: [*ra?] sha za mo rna ba 'dzin pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2081:159a-4: autstshushm'a pi sh'a tsi karna grihna sv'a h'a /
T02D2081:159a-6: nyi ma rgyas pa'i dus tshod la sbun pa spar
T02D2081:159a-7: do khyer nas dben pa'i sar bor la gtang ngo
T02D2081:159a-8: // zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi dus su 'dre mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2081:159a-9: de mi sdug pa'i gzugs ston na de la 'jigs par mi bya'o //
T02D2081:159a-10: sngags zlos shing de dang gtam smra'o //
T02D2081:159a-12: de nas de na re bdag gis ci bgyi zhes zer na /
T02D2081:159a-13: bdag la grub par gyis shig ces bya'o //
T02D2081:159a-14: de nas de na re bdag la gtor ma byin
T02D2081:159a-15: zhes zer na dur khrod du phyin nas bal sran
T02D2081:159a-17: de nas gter ston pa dang /
T02D2081:159a-19: gzhan yang 'dod pa thams cad ster ba dang /
